name: Robo with a pogo
description:
Robo with a pogo is a game i made with my friend in 3 hours. I hope you enjoy

Its really hard btw

Controls:

Robo will jump when the mouse is clicked. The further away the mouse the bigger the jump. You can also jump against the wall if you are fast enough.

Good luck :D

Leave buttons:

Alt F4

(I SWEAR I PROGRAMMED IT LIKE THAT)
